product_results.title: Restored Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max - Fully Unlocked - 1 TB Space Black (Refurbished)
product_results.short_description: This item is Restored. Utilize the iPhone 14 Pro Max to capture stunning photos with it's new 48MP main camera and get a peace of mind with groundbreaking safety features.AppleiPhone 14 Pro MaxUnlocked1TBSpace BlackMQ923LL/ARestored
product_results.detailed_description_html:
• “Like-new” condition with very light micro-scratches, invisible at a distance of 8-12 inches (arm’s length).
  • Battery life, if applicable, must be 80% of the “like-new” equivalent or higher. At least 90-days free returns.
  • AppleiPhone 14 Pro Max
  • Unlocked
  • 1TB
  • Space Black
  • MQ923LL/A
  • Refurbished

specifications.name: Assembled Product Dimensions (L x W x H)

top_positive.title: small review
top_positive.text: The phone came in early. There are no visible scratches on the screen, it actually looks brand new from a distance. The bezels arrived with very scratched-up paint, which I kind of expected from a refurbished product. A case should cover that up anyway. Overall, the phone works great despite that minor issue.

top_negative.title: False advertising %26 return NIGHTMARE!
top_negative.text:
Beware of VOVOYA INC.! Phone was almost $600 and listed as “Like New” however when it was received, there were deep scratches on the edges that were visible even from an arms length away and farther and water marks all around the sides. Returning is a NIGHTMARE! I'm still in the process of returning but it's been a back and forth with the seller and Walmart on who needs to provide the shipping label. The seller said I had 30 days to return however the website clearly states 90 day free return. All false advertising/information on VOVOYA INC.'s part. I've gone to my local Walmart to try to return with no success and have reached out to the seller and Walmart multiple times to get a return label to return the phone and get my refund. Idk why it's such a big issue to create a return shipping label to give to me.
On the upside, Walmart customer service has been easy to work with and seems like they are working on getting this issue resolved but that is still TBD since this is still ongoing.

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 14 Pro Max
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone like new quality new screen no dents or scratches the battery life came at 88%. The software is running excellent Very satisfied with the product. 100% would recommend buying from this seller I couldn't be any more satisfied it was an excellent and perfect purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend ordering from Walmart.
customer_reviews.text: The package was supposed to arrive in about a week after ordering but I kept getting late delivery notifications and at one point hadn't got an update in 11 days and it took over 3 weeks to arrive, I love the phone but the experience with Walmart was awful I wouldn't recommended ordering for Walmart if you want your package to arrive in a certain amount of time. Worst experience ever.

Don't WASTE your hard earned money not only did the phone come partially not working and couldn't download app but this seller don't like to refund I'm still waiting on my refund I had to call Walmart. I only had the phone for 2weeks and it says 90 day warranty which they don't like honoring. The phone was horrible and basically don't work and you can't contact the seller smh. Find someone else to buy from. The warranty will not get honored so you won't have a peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: Not in “like new” condition
customer_reviews.text: Phone was received with damage to the outside edges. Asking speaking with company several times and requested 20 % refund. The company declined and offered 20 dollars. Pictures were supplied  but nothing was done. As of this review we still haven't received any refund.

customer_reviews.title: Miss delivery driver
customer_reviews.text: My package was not delivered to the correct apartment number 307. it was left outside the apartment complex, anyone could have stolen it. the Fedex driver did not deliver to the correct address. I am totally frustrated and disappointed by the delivery driver Tarif

customer_reviews.title: Failed experiment and cheating
customer_reviews.text:
When I received the phone, I was shocked by the amount of scratches on the screen and edges. It felt like it had been in the war. I had never used it, nor had I put a SIM card in it. A few days later, I returned it to a Walmart in Syracuse. The experience shocked me. I paid $547 for a used phone, but it was almost new, as the website said, not a phone that looked like it had been in the war. Even now, more than a week later, I have not received my money back. Too bad! By the way, I documented the opening of the box and shipping bag when it arrived at my house.

 All parts of the screen have scratches, but there are 2 parts that look like the screen is broken from being so hard.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: The screen freezes frequently you guys beware I had to go to the iPhone store to see what was wrong and was told by the geniuses that the seller put bad parts in the iPhone
I have had the phone barely 3 months and it's gone to crap already. One would think when buying an expensive piece of equipment it would be of better quality.
